content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were visiting the black hills around the end of the motorcyclerally, and were staying with a friend whose parents had just built a nice newhouse in a canyonnorth facing side west of rapid city some 10-15 miles. we weresitting outside on the back porch enjoying the cool of the evening and had justcracked open our beers. jordan, our host, got up to visit the restroom and onhis way, the power went out. we laughed as he stumbled in the dark and cursedout loud.I now wonder how he managed to hit his mark, but perhaps he sat thatone out my wife and i were listening to the porcupines grumbling at each otherwhen i commented that the wind was coming up. she asked how i knew, and i saidthat i could hear it in the treetops. i did find it odd that i could not see thetreetops moving, yet the wind sounded to be drawing closer. i got up and movedaway from the house, my curiosity piqued. the noise of wind was definitelygetting closer and louder. i cast my gaze upwards and to the east, the apparentdirection of the noise. in that instant i saw a large black triangle movingtowards us over the treetops. it was entirely unlit except for the reflectedglow of a partial moon. it appeared to be turning to the south-west and my wifeand i observed it until it vanished over the roofline of the house. its apparentspeed was in the 250-350 knot range, not terribly fast, and just as a guess ithad a 180-200ft wingspan. my jaw gaped in astonishment, and my wife wasfrantically asking what that was. i had no reply for her, and was standing inwonderment when jordan came out of the house. i related what had just occurredto him and he was at first incredulous, then miffed that he had missed out onseeing it. some minutes latermaybe 3 or 4the lights came back on. some minuteslater, lights further up the canyon were observed coming back on. just as aninteresting side-note, the next morning, i was extensively questioned by jordansfather about the event. he seemed very interested in my account, which is nottoo surprising when one understands that he is a lifelong pilot and a colonel inthe air national guard, special assistant to the adjutant general of southdakota, stationed at ellsworth afb, a sac b-1 bomber base. he also consultedregularly at the pentagon as part of his regular duties. knowing all this, andhe having finished questioning me, i asked him directly if he had any knowledgeof what i had seen. his only reply was a small laugh and a big smile.
content.summary: Black triangle at night in skies of the black hill

content.detailedDescription: At about 1250 am on 81703, i went to my backyard after being awaken by myneighbors party across the street. the sky was clear and the moon was shiningbrightly, and one star was very bright, i thought it might be mars, since itscoming so close to earth, but it didnt have a redish tint, so i looked aroundfor it. i spotted what looked like two puffs of white smoke towards the east, ithought it might be a couple of clouds but one of them was wobbling, i thoughtmy eyes were playing tricks on me, since i was asleep a few minutes ago, so istared a little longer, the second cloud wobbled too, i must be nuts, becauseboth were stationary, i decided to go to the front of my house to get adifferent angle away from the citrus trees. still in the same spot, both objectsbegan to move upwards together, wobbling and circling around each other at anamazing speed, they would stop shortly and begin to move again in the samemanner.  i called my neighbor art, screaming for him to come out, by the time hecame out the objects were still climbing at about 80 degrees, but he could stillsee them wobbling and changing direction and circling each other, he was asexcited as i was. art wears glasses so he couldnt see the objects once theyreached 90 degrees, but i have 2020 vision and i observed them for an additional5 minutes, very faint, still dancing around, moving away and toward each other,but very far away. i have always believed in others accounts of ufos but this ismy first experience in my 43 years.  did anyone else observe this
content.summary: Two puffs of smoke, dancing in the night

content.detailedDescription: It was about 1130 pm. on aug 5 my wife my daughter and myself were taking acountry drive through somers ellington area seen light in sky thought it was alight on tower i told my wife to keep eye on light in sky so i could find aplace to pull over. my wife watched light circle from the right passenger sideof the car coming over the rode to drivers side it was banking left and right ata hight speed going straight up then it dropped like a rock about tree top levelover the road from passengers side to drivers side tree top level then aboutthat time i found a place to pull over the car and watch it. and for a second ilost track of it at that time i noticed it had stopped dead on the other side ofthe car and proceeded now from left to right from drivers side to passengersside through an open field 30 feet over the road and about 25-30 feet in frontof the car the lights on it were one white light on the tip and 2 red ones ateach wing of the tringle shapped craft and it made no noise. when it exceleratedit started dipping and swooping fast at that poing i couldent beleave that itdidnt crash going towards the ground so close and heading for the tree lineacross the field where it dropped behind the treeline, gone.We sat talking about what we just seen. myself i could see no windows no landinggear wheels nothing. it made no sound the crafts body itself was triangular inshape but as close as it was and the fact that my highbeams on my honda elementwere close anough to light up a nats ass a fifty paces we could not make out anybody markings or stile which was odd in itsself. it made no noise. it was bigand you could tell its black shape with the fixed lights.I will say that thereis nothing man made that could come that close to my car that anyone could notidentify. im x military 82 airborne special forces.My wife is a trainer head cashier my daugter is on unemployment. we should havebeen able at that distance to rule out any man made craft. on the way home westopped at the whole donut on rt 190 in hazardville ct. and by chance wastelling some of the people in there and the gentleman that was driving the motorcycle told me that he had passed us and remembered my car and said he seen it towhile he was in the same ares and had the same description.
content.summary: Seen ufo

content.detailedDescription: on or about 07-06-2003,i was taking photos in the area of offutt afb nebraska.I was phtographing the rc-135 aircraft that were flying in the area. iphotographed a rc-135 cobra ball aircraft that was taking off out of the westside of the base.Days later after i got the photos developed, there is an image of an objectalong with the rc-135. in the photograph you can see the rc-135 in the lowerleft of the photo. in the uppper left there is a unknowen object. the objectappears to have a white upper section and a lower section that appears black ordark black.As i took the photo, the rc-135 was the only aircraft in my camera viewfinder.I noticed the object only after the photos were developed.
content.summary: Small white objects above offutt afb nebraska.

content.detailedDescription: 1 on my way home on a paved rural raod at 10pm at night.2was looking at the moon and the planet near it, easily visible.3 thought both objects near planetstar may have been smaller stars until theybegan to move.Staye calm and tried to observe their pattern. looked at my watch during theevent and memorized the time. couldnt believe i finally saw something i couldntexplain. listened for noise and there was none no engine sounds, etc. looked forany signs of something like a vapor trail - none. tried to count the seconds ittook for the objects to zig zag as they went away from the star by the moon thenacross the horizon and out of my sight. about 8-10 seconds.5 objects were fairly close to each other but definately independent. they madean s pattern when going away from the moon and the star near it. the s patternswere similar but not exact - each had its own path but they stayed in closeproximity to each other. after the s pattern was completed, they both wentacross the horizon approximately west from my point of view. the speed varied asthe went. i watched as long as i could see them. they were quite visible even asthey finally turned and went away from me into the distance.6 i simply couldnt see them anymore. i was able to follow them with myperipheral vision for a short time once they went into the distance.
content.summary: Saw two orbs

content.detailedDescription: We were at rooster rock state park watching the meteor shower on august 13tharound 230 am. though the full moonlight kept us from seeing too many meteors,we still were enjoying the view. we were all laying or sitting down with ourgaze facing northward. my brother, kevin, said he saw a bright light. by thetime my eye caught it i saw a brief indigo reflection or flash to the right of abright dot, which was about as bright as a satellite. my brother, as he startedto look away, mentioned a type of satellite he thought that type of flashingindicated. right when he looked down, however, our friend erhan and i watched asit curved around changed directions from heading south to northwest. it movedabout the speed a satellite would in the sky. after a moment, it stopped andchanged directions again, this time back south. at least, i took that to besouth. in reality, because it was so high up, it looked like it was moving downand up with up being south. then it stopped again and moved in a comparativelyvery slow circle in the sky. it did a similar pattern in terms of movementanother one or two times that is, changing directions and then doing a smallcircle. eventually, it was too faded for us to see, though erhan thought he sawit much closer to the north horizon about 30 seconds later. the whole incidenttook about five minutes. we were all calm, amused by the event. later i wasquite excited because it was the first ufo id ever seen
content.summary: Indigoblue light in sky during meteor shower

content.detailedDescription: Driving in car outside small town at late night. full moon and house lightsonly. saw light blue non blinking light and faint white light seemingly attachedtogether moved across sky about 3 inches may have arched as it went, perhapsjust movement from driving suddenly angled downward at about 50 degrees andchanged into a triangle of white lights about penny sized with fourth lightclose to lower corner and went very quickly below tree level. may have been anengine noise not like prop plane or like turbine after i got out of my car. butby then it was gone.
content.summary: Blue non blinking light moving, turns to triangle,

content.detailedDescription: I as coming back to guayaquil from a town callede baf1os in tungutahua i was in the car passing throw the road near lake balbanerawheni looked at the shiny cloudless sky a white cigar shaped object with noother characteristic floating, first l was loking fpr wings to verufy that wasnot a plane and a saw none the i los him from sight 3 secondes in a curve and itwas gone, there were no clouds near the nearseest cloud was barely seen becauseof its location
content.summary: I saw a white cigar near a lake

content.detailedDescription: I was riding home with my friend jeff farr in his pickup truck.  he asked mewhat was that light in the sky behind us, and i looked behind us and saw abright light hovering in the sky behind us.  it would bend as the road bendeduntil we got to my brothers apartment.  at first, i thought it was jesus christcoming to us.  i was on cloud nine, i was so excited.  i had been on vacation in1986 to acapulco, mexico.  we, my mother and sister and i were staying at theprincess hotel. it was around the same time of the sighting, around 330 am and icouldnt sleep so i had gone down to one of the swimming pools and laid down on alawn chair and just started talking to the sky.  saying things like if anyonecan hear me show me a sign  i mean you no harm, i want to meet your people iwant to go to your planet. nothing ever happened that morning.  when we saw thelight two years later i just knew it was because i had summoned them to come.  iimmediately ran upstairs to get my brother to come and see this huge brightlight.  jeff stayed downstairs in the truck.  i ran into my brothers room andturned on his light and said, bubba, bubba, please get up and come out here andlook at this, i dont know what it is but you gotta see it its a huge light inthe sky  he said, shut up and turn off the light.  i said bubba, please come outhere, i dont know what it is he said, shut up youre going to wake up the ___damn neighbors now get out of here and turn off my light.  i said _____ youthen, dont come out here and look at it, im going back out here to see what itis when i got downstairs jeff was still staring at it.  i told him i needed somecigarettes so we drove up to the store at the corner. i tried to get the clerkat the store to come out and see it but he thought i was crazy too.  so i jumpedback in the truck.  the light was above us hovering, it had followed us andevery curve on the way to the store and back from the store it just followed andhovered.  when we got back to my brothers apartment, there was my brotherstanding there in his houserobe just looking up star
content.summary: All i can say that i saw was a light

content.detailedDescription: Saw lights, falling from a mile or higher, with friends, yellow round glow, withsparks , looked for did not find on ground anywhere, have lost days and hoursmany times, have had permintions sense the event all have happend after theseeing in my mind totaly random stuff, have them while awake and while sleeping,am really freaked out and worried, though these things would go away they havenot , please help me
content.summary: i have lost time, in periods of days and hours

content.detailedDescription: 1. i was on my flight home from florida on a jet at 20-30,000 feet at dusk.2. a strangely beautiful lone cloud with pinkpurple electrical lightshow win.3. a hover craft was what it initially struck me as being w2 greenishyellowlights staring out from inside the edge of the cloud, as if hiding.4. calm  intrigued during sighting.Surprised i asked no one to witness, after.5. hovering, perfectly still. the plane moved past but the lites never moved.6. i didnt notice it until i saw a lightning bolt come from under the cloud andi stared at until my plane went past it  i lost sight as i looked back out mywindow.
content.summary: Yellowishgreen lights seen in edge of cloud from a

content.detailedDescription: 1. the object was sighted from my back yard hovering silently above a near-byamfm radio broadcast tower two blocks west of my house.2. i had to let the dogs out before i left the house for work oa 0430 in themorning. i must leave at 0500 hours in order to arrive at work before 0600hours.   so i just happened to look up towards the west when this object caughtmy attention.3. at first i thought it was a partial moon or half moon but i quicklydiscounted that by the vertical cyninder shape of this object.4. i only had 20-25 minutes to observe this object before i had to leave thehouse for work, so i really didnt have much time to gather a reaction or feelingas to what i saw.5. the object was a dull orange glowing vertical cylinder that hovered about 500ft. above a near-by commercial radio broadcast tower approxiamately 2 blockswest of my house. the object moved slowly up and down and from side to side.  itwas also emitting or fireing off small globes of white light at radom fromvarious directions. you didnt see a trail as these lights were fired off butonly saw them when they flashed at various distances from the crafts, so theywere definately not marker strobe lights or navigation lights.6. i lost sight of the object only when i had to depart my house to go to myjobe site.Please please  do not use my name i wish to remain anonmis, as i have a securityclearence and work for the air force. i know definetly i would loose my job andmy security clearence if my identity were to be revealed.
content.summary: Dull orange glowing vertical cylinder

content.detailedDescription: Youll probably disregard this report.  nothings been sighted though weve lookedfor it.  over the past couple of weeks weve experienced several occurrences ofstrange low humming sound that elevates to a low rushroar that simply goes onfor too long.  sometimes the lights dim or there are power failures.  theres asort of electric feeling in the airbirdssquirrels get agitated and have been more aggressive of late following theoccurrence.  at nite, strange, almost musical beeping sounds, this on only oneand the above reported occcassion.  we were awakened from sound sleepinsects were much agitated and loudlights flickered.  heard low roarrumble for 20 minutes. seemed to come and go. we live in heavily wooded area of north houston and are near bushintercontinental airporthave lived there 12 years and disregard aircraft noises, we dont really hearthem anymorethey are background noise.  ive run out to check the sky on occasion, but wehave such a small piece of sky its almost pointless.  whatever happened sundaya.M. was close. too low to be an aircraft and didnt have the usual directionalquality of an aircraft.  only reporting this for your records and in the eventyouve gotten similar such reports.  thanks
content.summary: Aberrational noiseshums electrical disturbances
Silvery disk wblue rotating light

content.detailedDescription: The restaurant was a rectangular building sitting on a eastwest axis.  the frontdoor of the restaurant, where we came out, faced south.  a road ran east-west infront of the building.My friend and i had just closed up the restaurant and were walking to my car. it was about 1130 at night.  the car was parked right next to the building onthe east side.  a light in the sky, directly above and slightly north, caught myeye and i looked up, thought it was a street light, and continued walking.  theni realized that it couldnt be a street light.  the closest street lights were atleast 200 feet east and 75 feet west  of us, both lights being on our right sideas we faced east.  everything behind the retaurant, going north should have beendark and unlit.When i looked up again, i could make out a big 100-125 feet triangular shapedobject, with three white lights, hoovering in the sky, slightly above treetoplevel, and i called to my friend to look up.  i could see its silhouette againstthe clear sky, and could make out that it was a dark color.  i dont remember ifit was dull or shiny.The object faced east, i guess.  there was one light on this end, and one lightat each of the other two corners.  all of the lights were white and bigger thana fifty-cent piece but not as big as a folded dollar bill.  i remember thinkingthat i could see why i thought it was a street light.  it was the same color andbrightness, and it took a few seconds for me to realize what i was looking at. i dont remember what kind of light they cast, but it was enough for me to seethe object pretty clearly.My friend and i watched it hoover for a couple or three minutes, then it startedmoving east, toward the intercoastal waterway, which was about 1 mile from us. we stopped at the railroad tracks 100 feet from the restaurant, watched itapproach, then began following it.We followed it all the way to the water, driving about 10-15 mph.  we beat it tothe water by 4 or 5 minutes, then watched it approach.  it kept a steady speedand height from the time it first started moving to when we lost sight of it. we watched it go out over the water on its way to topsail beach, directly east.There were no boats or barges on the water.  there was a trailer park near wherewe parked, but we didnt see or hear anyone else.  we didnt see any other trafficeither, but it was late at night, and it was a rural area.My friend and i went home afterwards, thinking it was a pretty cool thing wedseen, but, for some reason, not feeling like it was a big deal.  strange,because we w
content.summary: Triangle with three white lights

content.detailedDescription: This is the second sighting of the same object, same flight path, slightlydifferent time. we missed it last night, nothing between 9 and 10pm, also thesky was very cloudy.
content.summary: Silvery light traveling eastward.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside talking with a friend around 1230 at night and i wasfacing the south-west skies looking over sprague lake at the glacier creekstables in estes park colorado.  i always looked at the night sky because it isso clear in the mountains you can see everything but, that night i noticed alarger, brighter star right above the treeline that kinda glowed in a white-ish,yellow light.  because of the unusual coloring i kept checking the skyline inbetween conversations when i noticed another identical light right next to thefirst and they both continued hovering over the treeline.  when i saw the secondlight, i did not take my eyes off them at that point. it was almost as if theycould tell i was watching them because after watching them both for only a fewseconds more that at the same time they flew straight up into the night sky likeshooting stars only they went straight up instead of accross or down  like ashooting star and then they disappeared into the atmosphere.  i was filled witha feeling of nervousness and excitement because i live for experiences like thatand feel that i was very lucky to have witnessed a rare sight like that and nomatter if people belive me or not, i love to tell that story.  oh, by the way, ialso have a picture taken through my telescope of a sonic boom in front of afull moon.  you can actually see the vapor trail in the space sky as the craftmade a u-turn to go in the other direction.  if you are interested in seeing it,please e-mail me back at quadhoppers@toast.Net and i will scan it and send ityour way.  that picture has caused a lot of controversy with military personnelso i do not freely share it.
content.summary: Sigting in estes park

content.detailedDescription: Hello to all and this thread is about an observation that is real and happenedto me this weekend in hells canyon idaho on friday night just before 1200midnight just after setting up camp at oxbow reservoir on the snake river innorthwestern idaho.Ib4ve always watched the night sky just like others on this forum looking forcomets and craft and have seen many single bright objects that have performedodd things such as move across the sky and then stop and sit there and twinklelike a star as if to fool anyone or anything looking up.This time is different and has profoundly changed me forever.On friday night on august 1st, 2003 at just before midnight, my girlfriend, herdaughter and myself rolled in to oxbow idaho and set up camp at the copperfieldrv park which is donated and cared for by idaho power for touristb4s and local folk to enjoy and use for fishing and various other summer timeactivities for a small over-night fee. i know this area extremely well. it hassuperb viewing for astronomers as well as itb4s elevation is at 3500 feet and there are no city lights near this remotelocation.I specifically went there to relax, fish and enjoy the stars as it is a favoriteplace of mine to go and do just that.On this night, the skies were clear and dark and perfect for looking up as themilky way was highly visible and the stars numbered into the trillions itseemed.We had just sat down and were facing east from this location which is located atprecisely the 45th parallel and were looking up and saying wow, look at all thestars.There was a small amount of icewater left in my water bottle as i fixed my eyeson a point of light at about 65-70 degrees up and to the east that caught myeyes immedeately.My full attention was on it as it grew brighter from its first pin-prick ofbrighter and whiter than normal appearance. i watched in shock as it grew andfell out of the sky at us and then exploded into a flower of 3 triangles and 1diamond on its side, all the while, i was now screaming do you see that oh mygodat this point, i had stood up and walked around the picnic table andapprehensively walked towards it as if to try to change my view while in shockto make sure it was really what we were seeing.It was real.Now, as these things reached an altitude of what ib
content.summary: We are not alone 4 triangular craft seen 8-1-03

content.detailedDescription: I was 12 years old and i had just taken a bath and was in my pajamas. it wasalmost twilight. i looked out my bedroom window toward catalina island, whichwas about 25 miles west. our apartment was about 5 miles from the californiacoast. over the ocean i saw a glowing orange disc, standing still in the sky. itstood still for several moments, and then began to move in a downward arc, goingcounterclockwise, to about the 8 oclock position. it stopped, very briefly.After a second or so, it shot up out of site at very high speed. at first i hadthought it was some kind of rocket or missile, because i had seen launches overthe ocean before. my reaction was matter-of-fact both during and after theincident, but now, 25 years later, i remember it like it was yesterday.
content.summary: Orange disk between san pedro and catalina island,

content.detailedDescription: Watching tv,saw lightning no bolts inthree seperate areas.Saw ship in centerarea during flash distinct shape.Curious so looked out window.Saw activity.,also smaller multi colored ship hovered above site watching many planesstill going on when repoet written
content.summary: Ufo near hudson

content.detailedDescription: Departed san luis obispo at 1545 hours for california valley. enroute conditionsinclude partly cloudy skies and humidity arriving at kern cattle and landcampground due south of soda lake at 1800 hours while several thunderstormsystems tracked east toward fresno.Weather system did not produce lightening however thunder was noted untilsundown.Throughout the evening until estimated 2210 hours, we tracked air traffic alongthe los angeles to san francisco north to south corridor, noting distinct andfamilar engine noise and strobing. likewise, we watched the northwestern sectorof our sky noting 3 metoroid entries. my colleague then called my attention tothe west on our visual horizon.I noted an object unrelated to current air traffic patterns flying due east downthe center of california valley at an altitude estimated between 18,000 to25,000 feet. object velocity was not relative to any above airborne traffic andacoustical signature sounded a few decibels under a normal aircraft engine.Likewise, object continued due east at an unusual velocity without typicallynoted strobing safety lights. object was estimated yellow in continous colorthroughout flight path to the east. neither did object jerk or weave.Moreover, at first glance, object presumption was military. however, object didnot sound like an aircraft on military afterburner. its acoustical signature eg.Doppler effect did not match, ie. short sound like tail as object moved acrossline of sight track.Initial reaction was calm due to 20 years of seeing and hearing various militaryaircraft. however, as visual tracking continued, reaction changed to excitementand apprehension. object behavior did not meet normal operating aircraftcriteria ie. safety strobing and acoustical signature.Object simply faded from visual due east tracking.Moreover, approximately 10 to 15 minutes later around 2235 hours, anotheranomalous event occured at 70 to 80 degrees off the horizon. we were trackingsatellites throughout the evening then observed an unusual geometeric pattern of3 objects tracking again west to east.Formation geometry was triangular moving half the speed of observed object.Geometric object lights were steady white much like earlier observed satellites.Again, emotional response ranged from calm to excited and apprehensive due toproximity of earlier event. eventually, object faded from visual tracking dueeast of california valley.
content.summary: Unidentfied flying event over california valley
Large white ball

content.detailedDescription: The three of us were standing in my friends driveway, rural location, very darkskies. we were enjoying the clear dark view of the heavens, picking outconstellations, that kind of thing. we all noticed a tringular formation ofstar-like lights, average star brightness, moving together across the sky fromeast to west. the three-point formation was not rigid. the shape of the tringleseemed to change slightly as the formation moved. we watched for about 2-3minutes until the formation disappeared behind the trees.
content.summary: Saw a formation of 3 lights move across the night

content.detailedDescription: It was sometime in dec. 1987 or 86 im not real sure, but thats pretty close.  mygirlfriend at the time was working at a local hospital in the x-ray dept.  shewas on call that night and got called in at about 330 a.M., it was late bowseason for deer and i decided i would take her to the hospital and then pick herup after she got of work that morning.  i dropped her off and then went to myhunting spot outside of town about 4 miles ne of boonville,in.  i arrived at myhunting spot on crowville rd. about 415a.M. as i did every morning when i wenthunting i stopped and got a big cup of coffee.  i was sitting there for about anhour listening to the radio for a weather forecast when i noticed that the radiowas getting static.  i looked around in the ski for an approaching storm when inoticed a bright disc shaped object to the se side of the roadway. it was overthe woods that i intended on going in when it got closer to sun up. the objectwas moving from the se to the sw at a very slow speed. the object looked morelike a giant mirror reflecting the images from below.  i thought to myself whatan excellent camoflage. i didnt notice any light flashing or any colored lights,it just reflected the lights from the nearby mine and the few streetlights downthe road i was parked on when it passed over the roadway.  i could till that itwas flying low and very close in front of me becausei could see through thebranches of some large trees in front of me. the object moved silently about200ft away in front of me.  it moved to the right of the roadway anddissappeared behind some trees on the sw side of me. i remember being verynervous at this point almost scared feeling.  i didnt like the fact that icouldnt see it anymore.  i sit their in the car and looked nervously around forthe object.  i dont really remember what happened next other than the next thingi know it is daylight and i am now standing out in the woods in a small clearingstaring up at the sky through the trees.  this was really weird i stood therethinking to myself what in the hell just happened, the last thing i remember iam in the car and now i am standing a quarter-mile in the woods. i will neverforget how quiiet it was in the woods at that momemt, usually the birds are sing
content.summary: A strange hunting trip

content.detailedDescription: My husband bob and i were sitting in the front yard, talking.  we didnt have anylight in the yard, only the street light and the kitchen light.As i looked up, i saw a moving light crossing the sky very fast in a straightline going east.  i showed it to my husband.  it was brighter than a star about4 times brighter than a star. it took that light about 2 minutes to cross fromone side of the horizon to the other. we have mountains on both sides.We couldnthear any sound and there was no trail to that light.  my husband said that thatobject must have been traveling out of earths athmosphere. i am very curious toknow if anybody else saw this phenomena.I believe in flying objects, being earth made or made by others. it was too highto come to any conclusion....I found it interesting and exciting and would liketo know more....I hope this info will be useful to you.
content.summary: Saw silvery light traveling west to east very fast

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were in our driveway talking when we both saw the object at aboutthe same time. it first appeared to us to be a large balloon and i told my wifeto bring the binoculars. upon viewing the object, i saw it was a metallic discshaped object, wobbling and bobbing, yet nearly stationary at about 30-35 percent of the horizion. we ran and grabbed the camcorder and retrieved an amazing5 minutes of fantastic footage. we also tried to take still photos with adigital camera but the camera failed. i am ex military 13 years and well versedin aircraft recognition and believe me, this aircraft was not in any manuals.The disc hovered and bobbed for approx 5 minutes and headed off quickly to thennw from our view.
content.summary: Videotaped metallic disc flying above my house

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside looking up at the stars, my boyfriend at the time pointed,and said, hey, would you look at that i didnt see the object right away, so hegrabbed my finger and pointed to it..I then saw a spinning triangle juttingacross the sky stopping momentariy as its lights flashed all around it.. theobject would stop in one direction, then jut across the night sky in straightlines, but in no defined direction.. my boyfriend and i were very taken by it,we ran into his house and asked his parents to come take a look, but they didntbelieve us, and continued watching tv.. ill never forget what we saw, whether itbe a satellite, space station, etc.. honest to god truth..
content.summary: Triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in the country side when a green glowing saucer appearedout of nowere in the sky, with flashing lights. then my dog started barkingmadly and the other animals were dashing about wildly. i quickly leaped behind abush. i was amazed as the object slowly moved from left to right. it hovered fora while then shot of  at an upward angle at a tremendous speed.
content.summary: Manchester
